    • Method Detail

      • setup

        public static void setup()

      • uiReadyFinancialCovTerm

        public static FinancialCovTermBuilder uiReadyFinancialCovTerm()
        Creates a new ui ready FinancialCovTermBuilder with the following fields set:

        • Coverage - if a coverage is specified via onCoverage or by using coverageBuilder.withCovTerm then use the specified Coverage. Otherwise a new ui ready WC med PolicyCoverage is created (see PolicyCoverageBuilder.uiReadyWCMedCoverage(gw.api.financials.CurrencyAmount, gw.api.financials.CurrencyAmount) for details about creating a claim to use with the resulting policy.)
        • CovTermPattern - set to a unique CovTermPattern
        • FinancialAmount - set to a CurrencyAmount with a unique BigDecimal amount and a currency of USD
          Returns:
          the initialized builder
